name: TrumpThoughts
0:

”Alexa, ask Trump Thoughts what do you think of Hillary Clinton?”
”Alexa, ask Trump Thoughts why should I trust you?”

des: These actual quotes from "the Donald" can provide very real life advice for anyone living in a state of mental insecurity.
